PathOfBuilding.Notes:
!!!I WILL MAKE IMPROVEMENTS AND FIX SMALL MISTAKES UP TO RELEASE, SO SEE THIS AS A PLACEHOLDER POB AND DEFINITELY CHECK BACK LATER!!!
FULL NOTES COMING SOON!!! (Leveling, Budget uniques, Tips & Tricks)
Will also link the Maxroll.gg article here once it's out :)
^xE05030!!IMPORTANT TIPS!!^7
- Bandit: Kill All - Until you get Wilma's Requital, you're basically a Hybrid Attack/Ballista build. No reason to miss out on damage! - I left open Suffixes on items intentionally, cap your resistances as needed! - Chaos Resistances will be more important than ever, so try and snag some! - Use Lifetap until Endgame so you don't have to engage with Mana Cost. We have so much Regen you'll hardly feel it. - Until you get your Small Cluster Jewel with Mana Reservation Efficiency, cut Haste! - Make sure you have your Flask Setup ready once you add Petrified Blood, otherwise you might degen to your death!
Leveling Section ------------------------------------------------------------ Act 1:
Level with ^x70FF70Caustic Arrow^7 + ^x70FF70Shrapnel Ballista^7. ^xE05030Puncture^7 can help for Bosses like Brutus as well.
^x70FF70Caustic Arrow^7 + ^x70FF70Pierce Support^7 + ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7
^xE05030Shrapnel Ballista^7 + ^x70FF70Pierce^7 + ^x70FF70Added Cold Damage^7
^xE05030Puncture^7
At Level 8, get 2x ^x70FF70Faster Attacks ^7
At Level 10, get^x70FF70 Withering Step ^7 and^x70FF70 Blink Arrow^7. Put ^x70FF70Withering Step^7 on your left mouse-button (instant skill).
At Level 12, change your main skills into:
^x70FF70Toxic Rain ^7 + ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 + ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7
^x70FF70Toxic Rain^7 + ^xE05030Ballista Support^7 + ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7
---------------- Act 2:
At Level 16, get ^x7070FFSummon Skitterbots^7 and reserve it. At Level 16, grab ^x70FF70Frenzy^7 and link it with ^x70FF70Lesser Multiple Projectiles^7 if possible.
------------------------------------ Act 3:
At Level 24, grab ^x7070FFDespair^7 and ^xADAA47^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7^7.
Unequip ^x7070FFSummon Skitterbots^7 and equip + reserve ^x7070FFPurity of Elements^7.
At Level 30-ish, do the Fixture of Fate side-quest and get 2x Efficacy + Malevolence. If you feel too squishy, keep using Purity of Elements, but Malevolence would be great for damage.
4-Link:
^x70FF70Toxic Rain^7 + ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 + ^x70FF70Void Manipulation ^7 + ^x7070FFEfficacy^7
^x70FF70Toxic Rain ^7 + ^xE05030Ballista Support^7 + ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 + ^x7070FFEfficacy^7
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Good Unique Leveling Items:
1) ^xAF6025Karui Ward^7 2) ^xAF6025Goldrim^7 3) ^xAF6025Skirmish^7 4) ^xAF6025Bloodgrip ^75)^7 ^xAF6025Quill Rain^7 (might be expensive)

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
Get these Resistances on your Gear (open Suffixes) +90% to chaos resistance +200% to all elemental resistances
New Life Mastery: 30% reduced mana cost
